title: Friends DVD credits font - ID required.
content:
Hi guys,

Anyone got an idea on what this font might be? (sorry, but I can’t seem to attach the image!)

Matt Atherton
author: fluiddruid23

comments.content:

yes, I have is no excuse, since there’s no lag time in posting on this new site. Mea culpa.
